page.title: 24A day in the life
page.content:
A day in the life

I woke up at 7:00am and went downstairs to have my breakfast.

Then I rushed upstairs to get washed and dressed. I was excited because today was the Summer Fair and Chloe’s birthday party in my class.

After that we went shopping which I found a bit boring. I got a pair of cute hairclips, which I could wear to school so it wasn’t so bad.

At home I had some lunch and got ready for the Summer Fair. I was getting nervous and excited because I was wondering if I was going to win the raffle but they had our number so I didn’t matter.

At the Summer Fair I ran to the first thing I saw which was the ball pit, that was fun and I won a prize! Next I went on the tombola and I won a bottle of wine, my mum gave me some money to go on more stalls, while my mum was drinking a glass of Pimms.

I had a very good time at the Summer Fair, but I had to go to Chloe’s party. When I arrived at the party, I was excited to find everybody on the bouncy castle, I kicked off my shoes and ran on to the bouncy castle.

It was good fun on their bouncy castle, but it was time tea and I was hungry. I had sandwiches and some different types of crisps, which tasted cheesy and spicy.

Soon it was time to go home and mum arrived to pick me up, I said to her “I’ve had a good time but I’m tired now!” Mum and I walked home and I said to her “I wonder if I have won anything in the raffle.”

Once I was at home, I watched television until it was time for bed-today was very busy and I had enjoyed it.


Pupil-Montbelle School
